Ruhan Sharief Shaik

Toronto, Ontario, Canada· (782) 882-2102 · ruhansharief22@email.com

Motivated by a curiosity to transform automation into Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, I have built a strong foundation in cloud infrastructure, distributed systems, and data engineering through my work at Arista Networks and previous roles in DevOps and SRE engineering. My experience in optimizing large-scale systems and developing Python-based automation has shaped my interest in applying artificial intelligence and machine learning to create optimized, data-driven systems. I aspire to deepen this intersection of networks, data, and AI driven automation through advanced research in AI and ML.
